title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 115.3 - Merger, purchase and assumption, acquisition and change of control applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 115.3 - Merger, purchase and assumption, acquisition and change of control applications

State Regulations

All applications for approval by the department to merge
with, purchase and/or assume, or acquire control (as defined in the applicable
provisions of the Banking Law) of, any bank or trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association, investment company, safe deposit company or
credit union shall be accompanied by information demonstrating that the
applicant has or will have an anti-money laundering program that satisfies the
requirements set forth in section
115.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
115.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
